org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.formattedtext
Class AbstractFormatter

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.formattedtext.AbstractFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITextFormatter
Direct Known Subclasses:
DateTimeFormatter, MaskFormatter, NumberFormatter
public abstract class AbstractFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITextFormatter

Base class of formatters. Formatters can directly implement ITextFormatter, or inherit this abstract class.

Provide several common fonctionnalities and constants for the formatters.

Method Detail

beep

protected void beep()
Emits an audio beep.

detach

public void detach()
Called when the formatter is replaced by an other one in the FormattedText control. Allow to release ressources like additionnal listeners.

By default, do nothing. Override if needed.

Specified by:
detach in interface ITextFormatter
See Also:
ITextFormatter.detach()

setIgnore

public void setIgnore(boolean ignore)
Sets the ignore flag.

Specified by:
setIgnore in interface ITextFormatter
Parameters:
ignore - when true, VerifyEvent events are processed.
See Also:
ITextFormatter.setIgnore(boolean)

public void setText(Text text)

Parameters:

See Also:
ITextFormatter.setText(Text)

updateText

protected void updateText(java.lang.String t)
Updates the text in the Text widget. The position of the cursor in the widget in preserved.

Parameters:
t - new text

updateText

protected void updateText(java.lang.String t,
                          int pos)
Updates the text in the Text widget. The cursor is setted to the given position.

Parameters:
t - new text
pos - new cursor's position
